塗.definition: to apply (paint etc); to smear; to daub; to blot out; to scribble; to scrawl; (literary) mud; street

塗去.definition: to obliterate (some words, or part of a picture etc) using correction fluid, ink, paint etc; to paint out; to paint over

塗抹.definition: to paint; to smear; to apply (makeup etc); to doodle; to erase; to obliterate

塗改.definition: to alter (text); to change by painting over; to correct (with correction fluid)

塗敷.definition: to smear; to daub; to plaster; to apply (ointment)

塗油.definition: to grease; to oil; to baste (cookery)

塗潭.definition: muddy water in a pool or pond

塗白劑.definition: a white paint applied to tree trunks to protect the trees from insect damage etc

塗脂抹粉.definition: (idiom) to put on makeup; (idiom) to prettify

塗蓋.definition: to coat; to mask; to plaster over

塗裝.definition: painted ornament; livery (on airline or company vehicle)

塗飾.definition: to apply paint, veneer etc; to plaster over; decorative coating; finish; veneer

塗鴉.definition: graffiti; scrawl; poor calligraphy; to write badly; to scribble

塗鴨.definition: variant of 塗鴉|涂鸦[tu2 ya1]; graffiti; scrawl; poor calligraphy; to write badly; to scribble
